title: Gaiam Essentials Thick Yoga Mat Fitness & Exercise Mat with Easy-Cinch Yoga Mat Carrier Strap, 72"L x 24"W x 2/5 Inch Thick; color: teal
descriptions:
Introducing the Gaiam Essentials Thick Yoga Mat ‚Äì your perfect companion for a comfortable and safe exercise routine. Designed with your needs in mind, this yoga mat is ideal for a variety of activities, including yoga, Pilates, and any floor exercises you enjoy.

At a generous 72 inches in length and 24 inches in width, the mat provides ample space for you to stretch out and move freely. What's more, the 2/5-inch thickness ensures that your joints are cushioned and protected as you exercise. This extra-thick feature offers a soft surface that is gentle on the body, making it perfect for those who appreciate additional support during their fitness routines.

Crafted from NBR foam, the Gaiam Essentials Yoga Mat is both lightweight and durable, weighing just 3.11 pounds. Its beautiful teal color adds a touch of style to your exercise time. Plus, the mat comes with an easy-cinch carrier strap, meaning you can roll it up and carry it with ease, wherever your day takes you.

Specially designed for the comfort and ease of our cherished elderly customers, this yoga mat provides a stable and non-slip surface that helps to reduce the risk of slips and falls. Whether you're enjoying a morning stretch, an afternoon meditation, or a fitness class with friends, this mat ensures you can focus on your well-being without any worries.

Make the Gaiam Essentials Thick Yoga Mat a part of your daily routine and experience the blend of comfort, support, and convenience it brings to your exercise and relaxation practices. It's not just a yoga mat; it's a step towards a healthier, more joyful you.
